title: Korg LP-380 Digital Piano
description: The Korg LP-380 is a stylish and compact digital piano with a rich, authentic sound. It features 88 weighted keys and a selection of high-quality piano sounds.

title: Yamaha P-125 Digital Piano
description: The Yamaha P-125 is a versatile digital piano suitable for both beginners and experienced players. It offers realistic piano sound and touch, along with a variety of features for practicing and performing.

title: Roland FP-30 Digital Piano
description: The Roland FP-30 is a portable digital piano that delivers authentic piano performance in a compact design. It features Roland's renowned SuperNATURAL piano sound and a responsive keyboard.

title: Korg SV-2 Stage Vintage Piano
description: The Korg SV-2 is a stage piano that captures the essence of vintage electric pianos and iconic keyboard sounds. It offers a wide range of sounds and intuitive controls for live performance.

title: Yamaha CP88 Stage Piano
description: The Yamaha CP88 is a professional stage piano that combines authentic acoustic and electric piano sounds with a intuitive interface. It features a graded hammer action keyboard and extensive sound customization options.

title: Roland RD-2000 Stage Piano
description: The Roland RD-2000 is a flagship stage piano that offers a blend of acoustic and electronic piano sounds. It features a PHA-50 keyboard with hybrid wood and molded construction for an authentic playing experience.

title: Korg Kronos 2 Music Workstation
description: The Korg Kronos 2 is a powerful music workstation that combines multiple sound engines, intuitive touchscreen control, and a vast array of features for professional music production and performance.

title: Yamaha Montage 8 Music Synthesizer
description: The Yamaha Montage 8 is a flagship music synthesizer that offers unprecedented sound creation capabilities. It features a touch-screen interface, powerful synthesis engine, and extensive control options.

title: Roland JUNO-DS76 Synthesizer
description: The Roland JUNO-DS76 is a versatile synthesizer with a wide range of sounds suitable for live performance and music production. It features an intuitive interface and a lightweight, portable design.

title: Korg Minilogue XD Analog Synthesizer
description: The Korg Minilogue XD is a compact analog synthesizer that offers a wide range of rich, vintage sounds. It features a polyphonic step sequencer and customizable digital effects.

title: Yamaha Reface CS Mobile Mini Keyboard
description: The Yamaha Reface CS is a mobile mini keyboard with a retro design and versatile sound engine. It offers a variety of sound-shaping controls and can run on battery power.

title: Roland JD-Xi Interactive Analog/Digital Crossover Synthesizer
description: The Roland JD-Xi is an interactive synthesizer that combines analog and digital synthesis in a compact design. It offers a wide range of sounds and built-in drum patterns.

title: Shure SM58 Dynamic Vocal Microphone
description: The legendary Shure SM58 is a dynamic microphone renowned for its durability and excellent sound quality. It's perfect for live vocals and performances.

title: AKG C414 XLII Condenser Microphone
description: The AKG C414 XLII is a versatile large-diaphragm condenser microphone that delivers exceptional detail and clarity. It's suitable for studio recording and broadcasting.

description: The Sennheiser e835 is a cardioid dynamic microphone designed for vocals. It offers excellent feedback rejection and robust construction.

description: The Audio-Technica AT2020 is a side-address condenser microphone that provides exceptional performance for studio recording and podcasting.

title: Rode NT1-A Condenser Microphone
description: The Rode NT1-A is a professional-grade condenser microphone known for its low self-noise and wide dynamic range. It's ideal for recording vocals and acoustic instruments.

title: Shure SM57 Dynamic Instrument Microphone
description: The Shure SM57 is a versatile dynamic microphone that excels at capturing instruments, including guitars, drums, and brass instruments.

description: The Neumann U87 Ai is a classic large-diaphragm condenser microphone with a reputation for its warm and natural sound. It's widely used in professional studios.

description: The Shure Beta 58A is a dynamic microphone designed for live vocals. It offers enhanced sensitivity and a tight supercardioid polar pattern.

title: AKG P220 Large-Diaphragm Condenser Microphone
description: The AKG P220 is a versatile large-diaphragm condenser microphone suitable for vocals, acoustic instruments, and overhead recording.

title: Shure SM7B Vocal Dynamic Microphone
description: The Shure SM7B is a popular vocal dynamic microphone known for its smooth and warm sound reproduction. It's widely used in radio and broadcasting.

title: Rode NT5 Small-Diaphragm Condenser Microphone
description: The Rode NT5 is a pair of compact small-diaphragm condenser microphones suitable for stereo recording and capturing detailed acoustic instruments.

title: AKG D5 Vocal Dynamic Microphone
description: The AKG D5 is a dynamic microphone designed for live vocals. It provides clear and powerful sound reproduction with a supercardioid pickup pattern.

title: Audio-Technica AT875R Shotgun Microphone
description: The Audio-Technica AT875R is a compact shotgun microphone suitable for video production, broadcasting, and outdoor recording.

title: Rode NT2-A Multi-Pattern Condenser Microphone
description: The Rode NT2-A is a versatile multi-pattern condenser microphone suitable for vocals, instruments, and overhead recording. It offers selectable polar patterns.

title: Shure SM58S Dynamic Vocal Microphone with Switch
description: The Shure SM58S is a variant of the legendary SM58 with an added on/off switch. It provides the same great sound quality and durability for live vocals.

title: AKG C451 B Small-Diaphragm Condenser Microphone
description: The AKG C451 B is a small-diaphragm condenser microphone known for its precise sound reproduction and ability to handle high sound pressure levels.
